---
title: "The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Association (NOAA)"
---

### NYC Inspections

#### Data description

The dataset is a subset of all NYC restaurants, including only those categorized as a bakery.


##### Variable descriptions

id: Weather station ID

date: Date of observation

prcp: Precipitation (tenths of mm)

snow: Snowfall (mm)

snwd: Snow depth (mm)

tmax: Maximum temperature (tenths of degrees C)

tmin: Minimum temperature (tenths of degrees C)
